subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brendan Gallagher had a goal and an assist and Dustin Tokarski made 28 saves as the Montreal Canadiens beat the host Detroit Red Wings, 4-1.
snippet: Brendan Gallagher had a goal and an assist and Dustin Tokarski made 28 saves as the Montreal Canadiens beat the host Detroit Red Wings, 4-1.
